Title: Exit Wounds
Plot: Captain John Hart returns to wreak havoc upon Jack's world, who ends up getting captured. It is up to the Torchwood team to rescue him and save the city.
GuestStars: Kai Owen, James Marsters, Lachlan Nieboer, Golda Rosheuvel, Paul Marc Davis, Cornelius Macarthy, Paul Marc Davies, Syreeta Kumar, Amy Manson, Tom Price, Paul Kasey
